Detailed Description

InputAnalyzer uses exactly one InputActionList for iterating over all possible actionobjects. Start of the iteration is done with GetFirstInputAction. GetNextInputAction will deliver the next possible action object(s) that matches the actionstring. If one of the both returns zero the lookup procedure is finished.
